name: Amazing Tile Puzzle
description:
Amazing Puzzle is very simple Jigsaw Puzzle Game. It uses Drag and Drop feature to move Puzzle Pieces. It a fun logic game of All Ages and contains images of cute cartoon animals. It is a game to improve your imagination, creativity while having fun. It's also family friendly.

HOW TO PLAY?

The rule is very simple. Just move the puzzle blocks to correct order. You can see the full Image by using the hint button which allows you to plan your moves better.

GAME FEATURES:

* Cartoon animals puzzle with lot of beautiful pictures.
* Amazing user interface.
* Three levels of difficulty (Novice - Casual - Expert).
* Very easy to play with drag and drop game play feature.
* This puzzle game is suitable for all family members.
